p: The structural variation in ring C subdivides flavonoids into six main subclasses: flavonols (e.g., quercetin, kaempferol, myricetin), flavones (e.g., luteolin, apigenin), flavanols (e.g., catechin), flavanones (e.g., hesperetin), anthocyanidins (e.g., cyanidin, pelargonidin), and isoflavones (e.g., genistein, daidzein) [ 93].
